Something tells me the red is where it isn't.... That much on the mun alone? I doubt it...

We know stock resources are based on RoverDude's work creating Karbonite. That map looks a heck of a lot like a Karbonite resource map (currently displayable with SCANsat) but overlaid on the globe instead. Given that, I'm pretty sure the colored areas indicate the presence of the resource, and the intensity indicates the concentration. Don't be surprised if the concentrations available are a few percent at most, requiring time and effort (and landed mass!) to extract meaningful amounts, in order to avoid completely blowing the difficulty of the game balance.

Red area is a HYPE resource !

1. verb. promote or publicize (a product or idea) intensively, often exaggerating its benefits.

We know stock resources are based on RoverDude's work creating Karbonite. That map looks a heck of a lot like a Karbonite resource map (currently displayable with SCANsat) but overlaid on the globe instead. Given that, I'm pretty sure the colored areas indicate the presence of the resource, and the intensity indicates the concentration. Don't be surprised if the concentrations available are a few percent at most, requiring time and effort (and landed mass!) to extract meaningful amounts, in order to avoid completely blowing the difficulty of the game balance.
